SEARCH
Package utils

Class DatabaseConf

java.lang.Object
utils.DatabaseConf
public class DatabaseConf extends Object
Utility class for managing the database configuration and schema for the application. It includes methods for creating, dropping, and resetting tables.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseConf

      public DatabaseConf()
      Default constructor for DatabaseConf.

      This constructor initializes a new instance of DatabaseConf. It may be used to create an instance of the class without any specific configuration parameters.

  • Method Details

    • createTables

      public static void createTables() throws SQLException
      Creates all necessary database tables for the application.

      Executes SQL statements to ensure the schema is ready.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • dropTables

      public static void dropTables() throws SQLException
      Drops all tables in the database.

      Ensures a clean state by removing all existing tables.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • dropAndCreateTables

      public static void dropAndCreateTables() throws SQLException
      Drops all tables and then recreates them.

      Useful for resetting the database schema to a clean state.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
